# isMuted

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the view plays the audio content of its Live Photo.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isMuted: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is `false`, indicating that the view plays audio content along with the motion content of its Live Photo. Change this value to `true` to play motion content but not audio content.

## Managing Playback

- **playbackGestureRecognizer**: A gesture recognizer that controls playback of the Live Photo in the view.
- **audioVolume**: The audio gain to apply to the Live Photo’s movie content during playback.
